title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; install via npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLMs, embedders and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact net.ollama4j.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; NuGet package Ollama.CSharp.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; gem install ollama-rb.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stacks adding GPU support, WebUI, and monitoring to Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs to your server via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI/CD pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single repo.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Tutorial repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B and import the GGUF into Ollama.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Curated collection of notebooks benchmarking latency, throughput and quality across Ollama models.
